title: Defanging an IP Address
content:
Given a valid (IPv4) IP address, return a defanged version of that IP address. A defanged IP address replaces every period "." with "[.]".   Example 1: 
Input: address = "1.1.1.1"

Output: "1[.]1[.]1[.]1"
